price: 208. Kaadu hebeltô magaalah шага mafinqisinnino Yallih digaalák ken meesissah tan fannoytit keenih rubne nee akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
